description: Non-Material Amendment of Planning Permission P2013/0605/FUL dated 17/09/2013 to amend wording of Condition 5 as follows: Prior to any superstructure works commencing on the site, a design stage assessment report confirming that the development achieves a Code for Sustainable Homes rating no less than Level 4 shall be submitted for approval by the Council. A Code for Sustainable Homes accreditation certificate shall be submitted for approval by the Council no later than 4 months following submission of the design stage assessment report.
decision_conditions:
Condition 5 of planning permission ref: P2013/0605/FUL dated 17 September 2013 should read:

Prior to any superstructure works commencing on the site, a design stage assessment report confirming that the development achieves a Code for Sustainable Homes rating no less than ‘Level 4’ shall be submitted for approval by the Council. A Code for Sustainable Homes accreditation certificate shall be submitted for approval by the Council no later than 4 months following submission of the design stage assessment report.”

REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and to secure sustainable development.
